Class ChatActivity.ChatMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.ChatActivity.ChatMessage
  • Enclosing class:
    ChatActivity

    public static class ChatActivity.ChatMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class for modeling messages on driver-passenger chat.
